mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte

Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
Even after the firework had ended,
And thank you also for doing all this for my sister.
I guess I had some other wish.
But actually, I am a little glad.
Because they have been playing Dodosuko a lot on TV lately, which I really like.
Do you know what Dodosuko is, Jintan?
The reason Menma did not go to heaven...
Hey, if you are going to sleep do it upstairs.
Make sure Menma does not notice.
Why do you think Menma did not go to heaven?
Is it because the firework was not Menma's real wish?
The reason Menma did not go to heaven is not that she had another wish.
Hey, were we really looking out for Menma?
Were we really hoping that her wish would be granted?
I know that I was only thinking about myself.
Because I did not want to keep seeing Jintan knowing he was thinking about Menma.
I wanted her to go to heaven.
I did not care about granting her wish,
I wanted her to go to heaven for my sake.
God must have seen through me.
It is the same with me.
but it shocks even me how my love for her has not changed a bit.
But now, only Yadomi could see her.
I could stand her being Yadomi's alone.
So I thought that granting her wish and having her go to heaven would be easier for me.
Do not you have something to tell Yukiatsu?
It is the same as last time.
That day you two plotted together
to test Menma's feelings for Jintan.
I know, I have always envied Menma.
But you are exactly the same.
You are envious of Menma because you love Yukiatsu, so you tried to make her go to heaven.
I have always known I could not measure up to Menma.
I do not dream about things that cannot come true.
Even if Menma goes to heaven, you are the replacement.
I did not mind being a replacement.
The one I have always been envious of since back then is you, Anaru!
Now, just like back then, you are Yukiatsu's confidant.
That is why I tattled on you that day.
I told Menma that you were going to test Jintan's feelings for her.
Then why did not she say anything?
Hmm, I wonder what I should do.
What do you mean you wonder?
They said not to tell you about it.
Let us go tell them we are angry.
But I really like everyone, not just Jintan.
That is when I knew I could not measure up to her.
It took a long time, but I finally became Yukiatsu's confidant.
But now I know that even now the one by Yukiatsu's side is...
I thought that if Menma went to heaven Anaru would cling to Jintan.
If that happened, I would have my place back.
So it was impossible after all.
How could we send Menma to heaven when we feel this way?
What is it matter how you feel?
It is a lot better than not doing anything at all!
If I do not grant Menma's wish...
If I do not make her go to heaven...
If I do not, Menma will never forgive me!
On that day, I saw Menma pass away...
I was afraid of staying here.
I wanted to run away, but for some reason I could not get away.
I am living in the base we built together.
I did not go to school.
I thought that if I went somewhere far away in the world, things would change.
But I always return to that place.
I am begging you, please make Menma go to heaven.
I know it is selfish of me.
It might be impossible to make Menma go to heaven when I feel this way, but I cannot let it go!
I cannot let go of the sight of Menma slowly, steadily drifting further away from me that day.
I was not the only one.
Everyone wanted Menma to go to heaven for their own sake.
We were not serious about granting Menma's wish.
I wonder if he is still at work.
Geez, he left all the lights on.
Jintan spent this afternoon with everyone from the Super Peace Busters.
Jintan's been acting a lot more energetic, lately.
I guess I will go take a bath.
I do not care about Jintan anymore!
I am going to apologize to Menma.
You have two sets of eyelashes.
I would thought the way your eyes looked had changed.
You are so hairy already Anaru, why would you want to add any more?
Anaru's fine the way she is.
But do not keep calling me Anaru.
We have all switched to using our nicknames again.
Somewhere deep inside, I was happy that I was the only one who could see Menma.
To be honest, I did not care about sending her off to heaven.
But she did not feel that way.
She said she wanted to speak normally with everyone, not just me.
That is why she wanted to go to heaven and be reincarnated.
Let us really grant Menma's wish.
Let us call Menma and communicate with her properly using her diary.
Let us try it one more time, together with Menma.
There is no point in talking about it without Menma here.
There are six of us in the Super Peace Busters.
I am counting on you, leader.
I will bring Menma right away.
Let us meet at the secret base.
It finally feels like we have started moving again.
And this time for sure, we will proudly send you...
It looks like my wish already came true.
I remembered the promise I made with your mom.
I think he is been forcing himself to act strong ever since I got sick.
I am looking forward to being reincarnated, but that is the one thing that worries me.
I have made him put up with a lot.
I really wanted him to laugh, get mad, and cry more.
I promise you I will definitely make Jintan cry!
I will be counting on you.
And even though I thought about it a lot...
I just could not figure out what to do.
That is why I decided to ask everyone for help.
So I called everyone and asked them to meet.
But it is not like I wanted to get everyone together to bully you or anything.
It is just that I am not very smart...
That Menma wanted to be granted so badly...
But it did not work out at all.
I wonder if that was a punishment for keeping it secret from you.
It does not matter if you keep it a secret.
I always go there, even if I do not have a reason to.
But to be honest, I like it more when you laugh.
I guess it is about time to say goodbye.
You cannot go yet, please wait!
I cannot be the only one!
I have wanted to see you!
All this time, I have wanted to see you.
I have wanted to call out your name.
I have wanted to apologize to you.
I have wanted to tell you I loved you.
But everyone else feels the same way.
They all wanted to see you again.
I wanted to grant your wish.
I love you so much, Jintan.
I want to be with you forever...
So much that I have thought it would be nice to stay like this with you forever.
It... it is hide and seek.
What do you mean, hide and seek?
Is Menma playing hide and seek?
I still have not said goodbye properly.
So that means Menma is already...
This time I managed to say goodbye properly.
This is hide and seek, right?
That means it cannot end until we find you.
You are not supposed to just say my name now.
I am really bad at hide and seek.
Come on Jintan, say what you are supposed to.
That way it will end the right way.
I really like you too, Menma!
And of course I really like you too!
A goodbye is not supposed to be one-sided.
Thank you for granting that wish.
Why did you do that Jintan?
Made her cry, made her cry.
Have not you done enough yet, Jintan?
I want to be with everyone longer.
I want to play with you!
That is why I will be reborn.
I will be... together... with everyone.
the flowers blooming by the side of the road also change.
I wonder what the name of the flower that bloomed that season was.
If you touched it, it prickled.
If you brought it to your nose,
it gave off a scent of ripeness and sunshine.
That flower is definitely still blooming somewhere.
The Flower that Bloomed that Summer
I like how kind you are.
I like how much effort you put into everything.
I like how fun you are.
I like how level-headed you are.
hhhhhh The'like' I am talking about hhhhhhhh is the kind that means I want hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh to become your bride.
The Super Peace Busters should always get along!
